law.text: The board shall exercise care to protect children with less severe behavioral problems from children who are seriously patterned delinquents by means of the most practical use of the facilities and programs available.
law.history: Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 173, sec. 10, effective June 18, 1964. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 938b-12.
